DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Acrobatic
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Balance and Jump checks.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Agile
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Balance and Escape Artist checks.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Alertness
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Listen and Spot checks.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Animal Affinity
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Handle Animal and Ride checks.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Athletic
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Climb and Swim checks.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Cleave
DND_FEATS_DATA.description:
Benefit: If you deal a creature enough damage to make it drop (typically by reducing it to below 0 hit points or killing it), you get an immediate, extra melee attack against another creature within reach.
You cannot take a 5-foot step before making this extra attack.
The extra attack is with the same weapon and at the same bonus as the attack that dropped the previous creature.
You can use this ability once per round.
DND_FEATS_DATA.effectsText: Grants extra melee attack on felling foe, 1/round.

effects.text: Grants extra melee attack on felling foe, 1/round.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Combat Casting
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You get a +4 bonus on Concentration checks made to cast a spell or use a spell-like ability when casting on the defensive or while grappling or pinned.
DND_FEATS_DATA.effectsText: +4 Concentration when casting defensively, grappling, or pinned.

effects.condition: When casting defensively, grappling, or pinned

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Combat Expertise
DND_FEATS_DATA.description:
Benefit: When you use the attack action or the full attack action in melee, you can take a penalty of as much as –5 on your attack roll and add the same number (up to +5) to your Armor Class.
This number may not exceed your base attack bonus.
The changes to attack rolls and Armor Class last until your next action.
The penalty to attack rolls and bonus to Armor Class are chosen before you make your attack roll (so you have to decide to use this feat before you know whether your attack hits or misses).
DND_FEATS_DATA.effectsText: Trade attack bonus for AC bonus in melee.

effects.text: Trade attack bonus for AC bonus in melee.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Combat Reflexes
DND_FEATS_DATA.description:
Benefit: You may make a number of additional attacks of opportunity equal to your Dexterity bonus.
With this feat, you may also make attacks of opportunity while flat-footed.
Normal: A character without this feat can make only one attack of opportunity per round and can’t make attacks of opportunity while flat-footed.
DND_FEATS_DATA.effectsText: Extra AoOs based on Dex; can make AoOs while flat-footed.

effects.text: Extra AoOs based on Dex; can make AoOs while flat-footed.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Deceitful
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Disguise and Forgery checks.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Deft Hands
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Sleight of Hand and Use Rope checks.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Diligent
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Appraise and Decipher Script checks.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Dodge
DND_FEATS_DATA.description:
Benefit: During your action, you designate an opponent and receive a +1 dodge bonus to Armor Class against attacks from that opponent.
You can select a new opponent on any action.
Special: A condition that makes you lose your Dexterity bonus to Armor Class (if any) also makes you lose dodge bonuses.
Also, dodge bonuses stack with each other, unlike most other types of bonuses.
DND_FEATS_DATA.effectsText: +1 dodge bonus to AC against one target.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Deflect Arrows
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You must have at least one hand free (holding nothing) to use this feat. Once per round when you would normally be hit with a ranged weapon, you may deflect it so that you take no damage from it. You must be aware of the attack and not flat-footed. Attempting to deflect a ranged weapon doesn’t count as an action. Unusually large ranged weapons (such as boulders or ballista bolts) and ranged attacks generated by natural attacks or spell effects can’t be deflected.
DND_FEATS_DATA.effectsText: Once per round, negate damage from one ranged weapon attack.

effects.text: Once per round, negate damage from one ranged weapon attack.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Endurance
DND_FEATS_DATA.description:
Benefit: You gain a +4 bonus on the following checks and saves: Swim checks made to resist nonlethal damage, Constitution checks made to continue running, Constitution checks made to avoid nonlethal damage from a forced march, Constitution checks made to hold your breath, Constitution checks made to avoid nonlethal damage from starvation or thirst, Fortitude saves made to avoid nonlethal damage from hot or cold environments, and Fortitude saves made to resist damage from suffocation.
Also, you may sleep in light or medium armor without becoming fatigued.
DND_FEATS_DATA.effectsText: +4 bonus on various endurance-related checks and saves. Sleep in light/medium armor without fatigue.

effects.text: +4 bonus on various endurance-related checks and saves. Sleep in light/medium armor without fatigue.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Eschew Materials
DND_FEATS_DATA.description:
Benefit: You can cast any spell that has a material component costing 1 gp or less without needing that component.
The casting of the spell still provokes attacks of opportunity as normal.
If the spell requires a material component that costs more than 1 gp, you must have the material component on hand to cast the spell, as normal.
DND_FEATS_DATA.effectsText: Cast spells with material components <= 1gp without them.

effects.text: Cast spells with material components <= 1gp without them.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Exotic Weapon Proficiency
DND_FEATS_DATA.description:
Benefit: Choose one exotic weapon, such as a bastard sword or whip.
You understand how to use that weapon in combat, and you can attack with it and incur no penalty.
You are proficient with that weapon.
Normal: A character who uses a weapon with which he or she is not proficient takes a –4 penalty on attack rolls.
Special: You can gain this feat multiple times.
Each time you take the feat, it applies to a new exotic weapon.
DND_FEATS_DATA.effectsText: Gain proficiency with one exotic weapon. (Choose type via specialization)

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Sneak Attack
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: When making a melee or ranged attack against a target, you deal additional damage if the target is denied its Dexterity bonus to AC (whether it actually has a Dexterity bonus or not) or if the target is flanked by you.
DND_FEATS_DATA.effectsText: Deals extra damage to flat-footed or flanked targets. Damage scales with Rogue level.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Rage
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: A barbarian can fly into a rage a certain number of times per day. In a rage, a barbarian temporarily gains a +4 bonus to Strength, a +4 bonus to Constitution, and a +2 morale bonus on Will saves, but he takes a –2 penalty to Armor Class. The increase in Constitution increases the barbarian’s hit points by 2 points per level, but these hit points go away at the end of the rage when his Constitution score returns to normal. (These hit points are not lost first the way temporary hit points are.) While raging, a barbarian cannot use any Charisma-, Dexterity-, or Intelligence-based skills (except for Balance, Escape Artist, Intimidate, and Ride), the Concentration skill, or any abilities that require patience or concentration, nor can he cast spells or activate magic items that require a command word, a spell trigger (such as a wand), or spell completion (such as a scroll) to function. He can use any feat he has except Combat Expertise, item creation feats, and metamagic feats. A fit of rage lasts for a number of rounds equal to 3 + the character’s (newly improved) Constitution modifier. A barbarian may prematurely end his rage. At the end of the rage, the barbarian loses the rage modifiers and restrictions and becomes fatigued (–2 penalty to Strength, –2 penalty to Dexterity, can’t charge or run) for the duration of the encounter. A barbarian can fly into a rage only once per encounter. At 1st level he can use his rage ability once per day. At 4th level and every four levels thereafter, he can use it one additional time per day (up to a maximum of six times per day at 20th level). Entering a rage takes no time itself, but a barbarian can do it only during his action, not in response to someone else’s action.
DND_FEATS_DATA.effectsText: When raging: +4 STR, +4 CON, +2 Will, -2 AC. Fatigued after.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Simple Weapon Proficiency
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You make attack rolls with simple weapons normally.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Martial Weapon Proficiency (All)
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You make attack rolls with all martial weapons normally.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Armor Proficiency (Light)
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You are proficient with light armor.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Armor Proficiency (Medium)
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You are proficient with medium armor.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Armor Proficiency (Heavy)
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You are proficient with heavy armor.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Shield Proficiency
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You are proficient with shields (except tower shields).

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Tower Shield Proficiency
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You are proficient with tower shields.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Bard Weapon Proficiencies
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: Bards are proficient with all simple weapons, plus the longsword, rapier, sap, short sword, shortbow, and whip.
DND_FEATS_DATA.effectsText: Proficient with all simple weapons, longsword, rapier, sap, short sword, shortbow, whip.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Druid Weapon Proficiencies
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: Druids are proficient with the following weapons: club, dagger, dart, quarterstaff, scimitar, sickle, shortspear, sling, and spear.
DND_FEATS_DATA.effectsText: Proficient with club, dagger, dart, quarterstaff, scimitar, sickle, shortspear, sling, spear.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Druid Armor and Shield Proficiencies
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: Druids are proficient with light and medium armor but are prohibited from wearing metal armor; thus, they may wear only padded, leather, or hide armor. (A druid may also wear wooden armor that has been altered by the ironwood spell so that it functions as steel. See the ironwood spell description) Druids are proficient with shields (except tower shields) but must use only those crafted from wood.
DND_FEATS_DATA.effectsText: Proficient with light and medium nonmetal armor, and wooden shields (except tower).

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Monk Weapon Proficiencies
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: Monks are proficient with club, crossbow (light or heavy), dagger, handaxe, javelin, kama, nunchaku, quarterstaff, shuriken, siangham, and sling.
DND_FEATS_DATA.effectsText: Proficient with club, crossbow (light/heavy), dagger, handaxe, javelin, kama, nunchaku, quarterstaff, shuriken, siangham, sling.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Rogue Weapon Proficiencies
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: Rogues are proficient with all simple weapons, plus the hand crossbow, rapier, sap, shortbow, and short sword.
DND_FEATS_DATA.effectsText: Proficient with all simple weapons, hand crossbow, rapier, sap, shortbow, short sword.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Wizard/Sorcerer Weapon Proficiencies
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: Wizards/Sorcerers are proficient with the club, dagger, heavy crossbow, light crossbow, and quarterstaff.
DND_FEATS_DATA.effectsText: Proficient with club, dagger, heavy crossbow, light crossbow, quarterstaff.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Weapon Focus
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You gain a +1 bonus on all attack rolls you make using the selected weapon.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Greater Weapon Focus
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You gain an additional +1 bonus on all attack rolls you make using the selected weapon. This bonus stacks with other bonuses on attack rolls, including the one from Weapon Focus.
DND_FEATS_DATA.effectsText: +1 attack with chosen weapon (stacks with Weapon Focus).

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Weapon Specialization
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You gain a +2 bonus on all damage rolls you make using the selected weapon.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Greater Weapon Specialization
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You gain an additional +2 bonus on all damage rolls you make using the selected weapon. This bonus stacks with other bonuses on damage rolls, including the one from Weapon Specialization.
DND_FEATS_DATA.effectsText: +2 damage with chosen weapon (stacks with Weapon Specialization).

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Fighter Bonus Feat Slot
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Grants a bonus feat slot that can be used for feats in the 'fighterBonusFeat' category.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Iron Will
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Will saving throws.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Great Fortitude
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Fortitude saving throws.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Lightning Reflexes
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Reflex saving throws.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Investigator
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Gather Information and Search checks.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Magical Aptitude
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Spellcraft and Use Magic Device checks.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Negotiator
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Diplomacy and Sense Motive checks.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Nimble Fingers
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Disable Device and Open Lock checks.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Persuasive
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Bluff and Intimidate checks.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Self-Sufficient
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Heal and Survival checks.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Stealthy
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Hide and Move Silently checks.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Skill Focus
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: Choose a skill. You get a +3 bonus on all checks involving that skill.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Test Daily Power
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: Grants a test ability usable once per day.

effects.name: Test Power
effects.details: This is a test power that can be used once per day.

DND_FEATS_DATA.label: Test Scaled Daily Power
DND_FEATS_DATA.description: Benefit: Grants a test ability usable multiple times per day based on Fighter level.
DND_FEATS_DATA.effectsText: Grants Scaled Test Power based on Fighter level.

effects.name: Scaled Test Power
effects.details: This test power scales its uses with Fighter level.
